component.summary: Nghe đài phát qua mạng internet
Ascultați la stația de radio prin internet

description.p: Shortwave is an internet radio player that provides access to a station database with over 25,000 stations.
短波是个互联网广播播放器，提供具有 25,000 多个电台的电台数据库。
Sóng ngắn là một phần mềm nghe radio phát qua mạng internet cái mà có khả năng truy cập vào cơ sở dữ liệu đài phát thanh với hơn 25.000 đài.
«Коротка хвиля» — програвач інтернет-радіостанцій, який надає доступ до бази з понад 25000 станцій.
Kısa Dalga, 25.000’i aşkın istasyon barındıran veri tabanına erişmenizi sağlayan internet radyo oynatıcısıdır.
Shortwave är en internetradiospelare som ger tillgång till en stationsdatabas med över 25000 stationer.
Кратки талас је пуштач интернет радиа који пружа приступ бази радио станица са више од 25.000 станица.
Program Shortwave je internetni radijski predvajalnik, ki omogoča dostop do podatkovne zbirke več kot 25 000 postaj.
Shortwave je prehrávač internetových rádií, ktorý poskytuje prístup k databáze s viac ako 25 000 stanicami.
Коротковолновое Интернет-Радио - это интернет-радиоплеер, который предоставляет доступ к базе данных станций, насчитывающей более 25 000 станций.
Shortwave este un player de radio prin internet ce oferă acces la o bază de date cu peste 25.000 de stații radio.
Shortwave é um reprodutor de rádio da Internet que fornece acesso a um banco de dados de estações com mais de 25.000 estações.
O Shortwave é um reprodutor de rádio por Internet que fornece acesso a uma base de dados de mais de 25 000 estações.
Shortwave to odtwarzacz radia internetowego zapewniający dostęp do bazy ponad 25 000 stacji.
Shortwave is een internetradiospeler die toegang geeft tot een database van meer dan 25.000 radiostations.
Shortwave è un riproduttore di radio su Internet che fornisce l'accesso a un database con oltre 25.000 stazioni.
Shortwave adalah pemutar radio internet yang menyediakan akses ke basis data stasiun dengan lebih dari 25.000 stasiun.
A Rövidhullám egy internetesrádió-lejátszó, amely hozzáférést biztosít egy több mint 25 000 állomással rendelkező állomás-adatbázishoz.
Shortwave je internetski radio reproduktor koji omogućuje pristup bazi podataka stanica s preko 25,000 stanica.
‏Shortwave הוא נגן רדיו אינטרנט המספק גישה למסד נתונים עם למעלה מ־25,000 תחנות.
Shortwave é un reprodutor de radio por internet que fornece acceso a unha base de datos con máis de 25.500 emisoras
Shortwave est un lecteur de radios internet qui permet d’accéder à une base de données de plus de 25 000 stations.
Shortwave on internetradioasemien toistamiseen tarkoitettu sovellus, joka tarjoaa yli 25000 aseman tietokannan.
Shortwave interneteko irrati-estazioen erreproduzigailua ba, 25.000 estazio baino gehiago dituen datu-base baterako sarbidea ematen duena.
Shortwave es un reproductor de radio por Internet que proporciona acceso a una base de datos con más de 25.000 emisoras.
Shortwave is an internet radio player that provides access to a station database with over 25,000 stations.
Shortwave ist eine Internet-Radiowiedergabe, die Zugang zu einer Senderdatenbank mit über 25.000 Sendern bietet.
Shortwave er en internetradioafspiller som giver adgang til en database med over 25.000 stationer.
Shortwave je přehrávač internetových rádií, který poskytuje přístup k databázi s více než 25 tisíci stanicemi.
Shortwave és un reproductor de ràdio per Internet que proporciona accés a una base de dades amb més de 25.000 emissores.

ul.li: Create your own library where you can add your favorite stations

description.p: Version 3.0.0 is a stable release, with the following major improvements since 2.0.1:

ul.li: Updated user interface that uses the new Adwaita design, with many improvements.
Support for the new GNOME 42 dark mode.
New option to add private stations to the library, which should not (or cannot) be available on radio-browser.info (e.g. local network or paid streams).
Display station bitrate information, which can also be used as a sorting option.
Save station data to disk so that it is still available when a station gets removed from the online database.
New button on the search page that allows to sort the search results.
Overhauled station dialog, with more clearly displayed information.
Update desktop notification on song change instead of generating a new separate notification for each song.
Shortwave can now be used normally, even if radio-browser.info is offline / unavailable.

description.p: Besides these improvements, this version also includes many changes under the hood changes, so many crashes and other bugs have been fixed. It also contains updated translations for 31 different languages.
This version contains minor improvements and bug fixes.

ul.li: Improve buffering to avoid audio issues for streams with a high bitrate.
Fix issue that no connection could be established when a VPN connection was active.
Automatically select search entry when the search view gets activated.

description.p: Version 2.0.0 is a stable release, with the following major improvements since 1.1.0:

ul.li: Get notified about new songs via desktop notifications.
New mini player window mode. Control important features with a super compact window widget.
Redesigned station information dialog window. Added ability to copy the stream url.
Improved keyboard navigation of the user interface.
Inhibit sleep/hibernate mode during audio playback.

description.p: Besides these improvements, this version contains many under the hood changes. The complete user interface has been updated from GTK3 to GTK4. Many app components have been modernised or completely rewritten. As a result, many crashes or other bugs have been fixed.
This version also contains updated translations for 27 different languages.
This version fixes a bug that caused some users not to be able to record songs.
This release also updates translations in several languages.
This might be the last release with the feature to import Gradio databases. The needed API server will be deactivated / no longer available in August 2020.
Version 1.1.0 is a stable release, with the following major improvements since 1.0.1:

ul.li: Add CTRL + spacebar as shortcut to start/stop audio playback.
Add stream buffering to prevent playback stuttering.
Add featured carousel to discover page.
Add support for non pulseaudio systems / environments.
Add support for additional mouse buttons to switch between views.
Improve stability of audio/recording backend.
Fixed issue that the volume didn't get calculated correctly (linear/cubic).
Fixed issue that broken stations are getting displayed in search results.
Fixed issue with random scrolling in search page.
Fixed issues which prevented to import Gradio databases.

description.p: This release also updates translations in several languages.
This might be the last release with the feature to import Gradio databases. The needed API server will be deactivated / no longer available in August 2020.
Fixes a bug that no songs can be saved.
Add Finnish translation.
First stable release.
Third beta release.
Second beta release.
First beta release.
